title: "Cornerstore Caroline" Falsely Accuses Black Boy of Sexual Assault | Amandla Stenberg
itunes:title: "Cornerstore Caroline" Falsely Accuses Black Boy of Sexual Assault | Amandla Stenberg
description:
A white woman wrongfully accuses a black child of sexual assault, vandals deface a historic monument with googly eyes, and Amandla Stenberg discusses "The Hate U Give."
